net.adamcin.commons.jcr.batch

Interface BatchSessionListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultBatchSessionListener

    public interface BatchSessionListener
    Listener interface used by the BatchManagerImpl to notify clients when their JCR session has been saved automatically
    Author:
    madamcin

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onRemove(BatchRemoveInfo info)
      Called by the BatchSession after a *successful* call to Node.remove(), but *before* an auto-save commits the change
      void onSave(BatchSaveInfo info)
      Called by the BatchSession after a *successful* call to the underlying JCR Session's save() method

    • Method Detail

      • onSave

        void onSave(BatchSaveInfo info)
        Called by the BatchSession after a *successful* call to the underlying JCR Session's save() method
        Parameters:
        info - the BatchSaveInfo describing the save operation

        void onRemove(BatchRemoveInfo info)
        Called by the BatchSession after a *successful* call to Node.remove(), but *before* an auto-save commits the change
        Parameters:
        info - the BatchRemoveInfo describing the remove operation
